sentences.en: After the word, the millionaire see the light of the gold.
sentences.cn: 话落, 富翁看到金色的光芒. 许多人穿着华丽的衣服在跳舞、狂欢.

sentences.en: As a silk hat on a Bradford millionaire.
sentences.cn: 就好像丝绒帽戴在了勃莱德弗富翁的头上.

sentences.en: His best - selling albums and several commercials have made Chou a millionaire.
sentences.cn: 几张畅销专辑和一些广告就为他赢得了百万身家.

sentences.en: His best - selling albums and several commercials have made Chou millionaire.
sentences.cn: 几张畅销专辑和一些广告就为他赢得了百万身家.

sentences.en: I am ghosting for a millionaire.
I'm no millionaire yet, but I've cleared $ 1 , 000 already.
sentences.cn: 虽然我还不是百万富翁, 但是我也攒了一千元美元了.

sentences.en: If only I were a millionaire!
sentences.cn: 我现在要是个大富翁就好了!

sentences.en: Laura has been dreadfully stuck up since she married a millionaire.
sentences.cn: 自从劳拉嫁给一位富翁后,便自高自大起来.

sentences.en: Lord White is as sleek and elegant as any other multi millionaire businessman.
sentences.cn: 怀特勋爵和其他千万富商一样，外表时髦，举止优雅。

sentences.en: Mary is always having fantastes about marrying a millionaire.
sentences.cn: 玛丽老是抱着嫁给百富翁的幻想.

sentences.en: Of course, the millionaire went to heaven as he wished.
sentences.cn: 当然, 最后老富翁如愿的上了天堂.

sentences.en: That ( millionaire ) owns his own ship and helicopter.
sentences.cn: 那个富翁有自已的船和直升飞机.

sentences.en: The millionaire had a staff of 30 servants.
The millionaire lived in complete isolation from the outside world.
sentences.cn: 这位富翁过着与世隔绝的生活.

sentences.en: The university was founded by a millionaire philanthropist.
sentences.cn: 这所大学的创建人是位腰缠万贯的慈善家.

words.tran_cn: 百万分之一的；第一百万的
百万富婆；百万富翁的妻子

trans.tran_cn: 百万富翁，大富翁，大财主，有钱人
trans.tran_en: someone who is very rich and has at least a million pounds or dollars
